originalText.text: Dr Berg delivered my kids years ago at NYU Langone Hospital. I am delighted to have him again since my previous provider retired. Dr Berg is attentive to the situation and makes you feel calm. He explains everything thoroughly and compassionately. Nice to have you again Dr Berg!

text.text: Dr Berg delivered my kids years ago at NYU Langone Hospital. I am delighted to have him again since my previous provider retired. Dr Berg is attentive to the situation and makes you feel calm. He explains everything thoroughly and compassionately. Nice to have you again Dr Berg!

originalText.text:
From the moment I walked in the receptionist were attentive and kind, my wait was short and the medical assistant that took my blood pressure and got me settled was efficient and communicative.

Dr. Berg was straightforward, knowledgeable and gave me all the facts I needed. He was able to refer me to an MRI and get me on calendar for next steps based on my request. Overall, it was a good experience that made me leave feeling comfortable with the next steps and more informed about the options my decision. Dr. Berg was professional and took time to listen and answer my questions.

originalText.text: Check Yelp/healthgrade reviews. I mistakenly looked at these reviews when booking my appointment. This office and doctor are super disorganized. Their phone line hasn’t worked for a month and they don’t respond to portal messages. They will bill you incorrectly and good luck reaching a human to fix the issue. In short avoid.

Their phone line hasn’t worked for a month and they don’t respond to portal messages. They will bill you incorrectly and good luck reaching a human to fix the issue. In short avoid.

originalText.text: Dr. Berg is an amazing doctor!!!  He delivered all 4 of my children and my granddaughter. He will never truly understand what he has done for me and he may not even remember. When he first became my doctor many years ago, he came to see me when I was at a hospital he no longer worked at, when he was off spending time with his mother on his day off. When I saw him walk into my room that day I started crying because I knew he was not just an ordinary doctor and that no matter what happened God placed me in the best hands possible. I could have never walked this journey of having my children without Dr. Berg. I have so many wonderful memories with him. He always made me feel safe and that I was in the best care. If I had the opportunity to do it all again, I would without a shadow of a doubt...choose him.

originalText.text: The office is in a good location. There are very nice girls at the reception who will quickly help you fill out the questionnaire. Doctor Berg from God. Excellent doctor
